segment.source: Application Virtualization Client Management Console Roadmap
segment.target: Application Virtualization Client Management Console Roadmap

segment.source: The Application Virtualization Client Management Console is a snap-in to the Microsoft Management Console.
segment.target: The Application Virtualization Client Management Console is a snap-in to the Microsoft Management Console.

segment.source: Administrators and users can use the Application Virtualization Client Management Console to configure the Desktop Client and Client for Remote Desktop Services (formerly Terminal Services) and manage desktops and applications.
segment.target: Administrators and users can use the Application Virtualization Client Management Console to configure the Desktop Client and Client for Remote Desktop Services (formerly Terminal Services) and manage desktops and applications.

segment.source: The following lists represent some of the available procedures in the Client Management Console.
segment.target: The following lists represent some of the available procedures in the Client Management Console.

segment.target: The following topics detail some general administrative tasks you can perform:
